name: Neutrogena Hydro Boost Translucent Loose Setting Powder with Purified Hyaluronic Acid for Smooth Skin, Blurs Imperfections and Sets Makeup, Lightweight Face Powder, .44 oz
short_description: Neutrogena Hydro Boost Translucent Loose Setting Powder helps blur imperfections and sets makeup in place while keeping skin feeling smooth, radiant, and hydrated without drying or caking
This translucent face powder is enriched with purified hyaluronic acid, a hydrating ingredient that binds water to skin
A lightweight formula, the powder applies evenly and seamlessly to minimize the look of pores and lock in foundation, concealer, or blush so makeup wears well all day
Designed to enhance your makeup routine, this setting powder provides a silky, shine-free finish and can be applied to face or targeted areas
Use Neutrogena Hydro Boost setting powder as the final step in your beauty routine for a flawless, pore-blurred look that won’t dry out your skin
product_description: Achieve a flawless finish with Neutrogena Hydro Boost Translucent Loose Setting Powder. This weightless setting powder helps blur imperfections, and lock makeup in place without drying your skin. Infused with purified hyaluronic acid, it leaves skin feeling hydrated, silky smooth and looking radiant. The translucent powder blends seamlessly onto skin without appearing chalky or cakey. Designed to minimize the look of pores, this loose face powder is ideal for all skin tones. After applying foundation, dust the powder over your face using a brush or puff for long-lasting wear. It’s the perfect final step for a smooth, hydrated makeup look that lasts all day.

For Best Use: To set make up, press blurring setting powder into freshly applied foundation or concealer with a powder puff, beauty sponge, or brush. After waiting for a few minutes, lightly dust off remaining loose powder for a soft matte look

product_description: Infallible Up To 24H Blur-fection Longwear Loose Setting Powder: Lightweight, airy powders give a beautiful blurring effect while brightening. Ultrafine, velvety powder absorbs shine, prevents flashback, and locks in makeup for up to 24H. Use to blur the appearance of fine lines and pores, highlight face contour, or to bake under the eye to brighten. Apply Blur-fection powder onto all areas you would like to blur, mattify, or brighten including T zone, sides of nose, chin and under eyes. name: Morphe Mini Bake & Set Translucent Setting Powder - Lightweight, Talc-Free Finishing Powder for Face Makeup with a Soft, Natural Finish - Minimizes Shine for Up to 24HR - Translucent (0.09 oz)
short_description: The Ultimate Staying Powder - Set, bake or brighten all over. Bake + Set face powder is perfect for on-the-go or everyday application, with a range of shades for sheer, brightening and color-correcting effects. Suitable for oily, combination or normal skin types.
Key Ingredients - Made with a talc-free, lightweight and finely milled formula, this loose setting powder sweeps on with an imperceptible, soft, natural finish, while smoothing pores and fine lines.

All Day Performance - Our translucent powder has up to 16 hours of wear and 24 hours of shine control, based on a clinical study of 32 subjects when worn with foundation vs. when wearing foundation alone.

How to Use - To set, apply the loose powder with a powder brush by tapping off excess, and then sweeping it over the complexion. To bake, apply with a puff or damp beauty sponge by gently pressing and rolling onto the complexion.

Celebrate Your Inner Artist - Over the years, Morphe continues to break boundaries, fueled by iconic collaborations, internet-breaking launches, and an ever-increasing community. Today, Morphe exists to celebrate the inner artist in everyone by empowering beauty beginners and professionals alike with the tools and products to express themselves, unapologetically.

product_description: Keep shine at bay all day with Covergirl Clean Invisible Loose Powder. Formulated with only simple clean ingredients that are kind to the skin, discover this face powder’s all-new talc and fragrance-free formula made with 100% natural origin pigments and only 15 essential ingredients. Your complexion will never look better thanks to its silky fine loose powder that delivers a beautifully natural finish while its non-comedogenic, vegan formula won’t block your pores. Available in 6 beautiful shades, its vegan puff sponge ensures easy application and helps to avoid creases, cakiness and patchiness. To help care for the planet as well as yourself, this setting powder’s packaging is now made from 25% recycled materials and FSC-certified card. Based on a consumer study of 96 women after one week of use: • 100% say skin looks and feels soft • 98% say the powder blends seamlessly • 97% say it provides a natural looking complexion and doesn’t cake • 96% say this powder makeup feels like bare skin • 95% say it doesn’t crease

name: e.l.f. High Definition Powder, Loose Powder, Lightweight, Long-Lasting, Creates Soft Focus Effect, Masks Fine Lines & Imperfections, 0.28 Oz, Soft Luminance
short_description: SKIN-PERFECTING SETTING POWDER: Ready, set, selfie—this setting powder ensures you’re always insta-ready by subtly blurring fine lines, pores, and blemishes for a radiant complexion.

DELIVERS SHEER, NATURAL COVERAGE: The loose, light-as-air formula delivers translucent coverage that blends effortlessly onto your skin, giving you a smooth soft-focus finish that won’t cake or crease.
HOW TO USE: Swirl a powder brush over the powder, tap of the excess, and buff onto the face and neck. Wear alone, or use it to set foundation and makeup for a long-lasting look.
FOR ALL SKIN TYPES: The e.l.f. High Definition Powder is perfectly compatible with all skin types.

SKIN-LOVING INGREDIENTS: All e.l.f. products are made from skin-loving ingredients you want, minus the toxins you don’t—all at good-for-you prices. All e.l.f. products are 100% cruelty-free and Vegan.
product_description: "The High Definition Powder is your secret weapon to a flawless face. This versatile loose powder can be worn to set your makeup or worn alone to reduce shine on days when you feel like going au natural – either way you’ll be putting your best face forward. e.l.f. makes the best of beauty accessible to every eye, lip, and face. Your originality is infinite, and we are inspired by what makes you unique. From the early explorer to the trend-obsessed beauty junkie—glam or bare faced, minimalist, maximalist and every look in between—we are for every eye, lip, and face. Proud to be 100% vegan and cruelty-free, worldwide.

Our exclusive microspun formula where loose powder particles are spun and swirled until they reach cloudlike softness can be used to set makeup or as a foundation. Kind-to-skin formula that won't clog pores, the Airspun Loose Face Powder will be your everyday go-to.
